column4: Hi all, Happy New Year, Im installing ubunto after a failed fedora 6 system. Quick question. Can I get the latest software for kde, firefox etc etc from certain apt repos or am i going to need to install from each site?
well ive done the dist-upgrade and its only at kde 3.5.2 ( i wanted 3.5.5 ) and firefox 1.5
maybe i dont have all the apt repos configured
